# Compliance & Standards

This directory contains compliance documentation and phase tracking.

## Swift 6 Concurrency Compliance

- **CONCURRENCY_COMPLIANCE.md** - Swift 6 strict concurrency compliance status
- **PHASE_1_FREEZE.md** - Phase 1 freeze policy and constraints
- **PHASE_2_PARALLELISM.md** - Phase 2 parallelism planning

## Quality & Hardening

- **QUALITY_IMPROVEMENTS.md** - Quality improvements documentation
- **PRE_USER_HARDENING.md** - Pre-user hardening phase tracking

---

These documents track BlazeDB's compliance with Swift 6 concurrency standards and quality improvements.
